Class Person

  • java.lang.Object
    • Person
  • public class Person
extends java.lang.Object
    A Person, placed in a Room, is a non-player character who can talk when the player enters the room. Person has two fields: name and gotItem. name is the name of the NPC. gotItem shows whether or not the NPC received an item from the player and gave the player help. NPC will give the player help if the player gives him/her an item. After the NPC receives an item and gives the player help, NPC cannot continue to receive items and give help.

        public java.lang.String giveHelp()

      • gotItem

        public boolean gotItem()
        Check if the NPC received an item from the player.
